name: CoderFarm
description:
Welcome to CoderFarm.

  • ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  • The aim of the game is to chill and relax!
  • One in-game day equals 25 minutes real time. A new day starts with the rooster crowing at 6.00 AM.
  • Whether you are working or studying, CodeFarmer, with its peaceful ambiance and serene setting, will be the perfect Pomodoro Timer for you.
  • To maximize profit, follow this order:Fertilize your soil -> Plow your soil -> Give yourself a day off -> Sow your seeds -> Water daily -> Harvest the fruits of your hard-earned labor!
    Neglecting to nurture the soil (skipping the fertilizing and plowing steps) will yield poorer results.
  • Your first land expansion costs 1000. Every subsequent expansion will cost 1000 + (number of row or columns) * 100.
